docs.abstract: Shimp receives award; she comments; is writing book about experience; illus (S)

keywords.value: TOBACCO, TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND SMOKERS ARTICLE
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: Donna Shimp of Salem yesterday received the American Lung Association's "outstanding achievement" award for her court victory in achieving a work environment free of the tobacco smoke that she said had frequently made her ill.
docs.snippet: Donna Shimp of Salem yesterday received the American Lung Association's "outstanding achievement" award for her court victory in achieving a work environment free of the tobacco smoke that she said had frequently made her ill.
